m_szDocTitle: Will Tesla (TSLA) Stock Be Hurt by Audi, Porsche Competition? - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet Will Tesla (TSLA) Stock Be Hurt by Audi, Porsche Competition? By Amanda Gomez | 09/14/15 - 11:25 AM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) --Â Tesla ( TSLA - Get Report ) is facing new competition from Audi and Porsche, both owned by Volkswagen ( VLKAY ), after the luxury carmakers unveiled battery-powered vehicles at an auto show in Frankfurt, Germany on Monday. Tesla had benefitted from being the innovator of battery-powered cars, increasing their driving range and reducing costs, Reuters reports. Analysts are split on how the new battery-powered Audi and Porsche will affect Tesla. The
